Ensure a Python code follows PEP8 style. The /ai/tools/pep8-convert API accepts requests in the following format:

PEP8ConvertRequest Model - Request to convert Python code to PEP8 style.
files File Array
required
example: [{"name": "file.py", "content": "fileContent"}]
Files present in the project in which the algorithm is.
Example 
{
  "files": "[{"name": "file.py", "content": "fileContent"}]"
  ]
}
File Model - File for a AI.
name string
Name of a file.
content string
Contents of the file.
Example 
{
  "name": "string",
  "content": "string"
}
